repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Feminist author. Collection contains printed materials, cassette tapes, and photographs related to the radical women's and lesbian separatist movement. Publication titles include "Absent from the Majority: working class women in America" and "Quest: a feminist quarterly." Recordings created at the Southern Women's Caucus, June 18, 1975.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
Also, original audiovisual materials are closed to patron use. Use copies are available in the collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Linda Damico Papers, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Linda Damico Papers were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2000.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection is minimally processed: materials may not have been ordered and described beyond their original condition.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Linda Damico was a feminist writer.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains printed materials, cassette tapes, and photographs related to the radical women's and lesbian separatist movement. Publication titles include "Absent from the Majority: working class women in America" and "Quest: a feminist quarterly." Recordings created at the Southern Women's Caucus, June 18, 1975. Acquired as part of the Sallie Bingham Center for Women's History and Culture.

controlaccess.head: Subject Headings
controlaccess.p: These are searchable subject entries for this collection. Performing a search on these subjects in the Duke University Libraries online catalog will bring up other related research materials.
